title: Eluxe Horoscopes For April 2023
cleaned_text:
What’s in the stars for you this month? Renowned Astrologer, Claudia Vannini reads your Eluxe horoscope

If you love Eluxe horoscopes as much as we do, why not get your personal birth chart done?

For more Eluxe horoscopes, a personal or daily reading, astrological chart or ‘karmic’ reading of your personality, contact: pegadaastrologica@gmail.com. Follow Claudia on Instagram here.

The first Eclipse of the year arrives…with everything, everywhere, all at once!

It affects Pluto and brings the opportunity for big changes. This Eclipse marks the end of a theme. And as a result, each sign will face some kind of challenge. Know yours by reading your month’s prediction. Take the opportunity to deal with your challenge with wisdom and good humour.

On May 5th, we have another eclipse, this time in Aries. At this time, you will have enough energy to renew your life. It’s time for closure. Leos, Cancers, Aries and Scorpios will feel the movements of the Sun most strongly.

On April 3rd, Mercury enters Taurus. The Planet affects the realm of wealth and finances. You thought the banks were insecure before? At this time, they can succumb to even more pitfalls and scandals!

Looking for better news? A beautiful day is April 11th. The Sun and Jupiter, set in Aries, replenish our hope for better days. On that day, Venus enters Gemini. All romantic relationships based on intellectual interactions will thrive on this day, but relationships based on sexual attraction alone will falter.

Between the 16th and the 19th, we enter the astral holidays. The Planets are not interested in us. It’s a well-deserved rest, before a very strong Eclipse. And, on the 20th, the Eclipse happens in a square with Pluto.

Hold on tight. This event has a very destructive tone and facilitates the announcement of wars and conflicts. Soon after, the Sun enters Taurus. We must pay close attention to the financial oscillations of the Chinese market and the movements made by Russia and Iraq.

Between April 21st and May 15th, Mercury enters the retrograde phase. As always, avoid elective surgeries and protect your electronics. Cars also often fail. Drive carefully and back up your files. Confirm your airline tickets and hotel reservations. Do not send sensitive messages without keeping a copy. Imagine that no one understands what you say; don’t make assumptions. Always be clear and double check for clarification.

Take advantage of this busy month in the astral plane, but without Eclipses or retrograde planets.

3rd – Gibbous Moon in Virgo – time to persevere in a theme

17th – Balsamic Moon in Pisces – conducive to healing, forgiveness and breaking up

27th – Waxing Moon in Leo – there are no guarantees, persist

A good month to all! Enjoy every moment of this wonderful planetary adventure and be happy on Earth!

Read your Sun Sign and Rising Sign, too.

PS: Directly from the WORMHOLE by Claudia Vannini – March, 8th, 2017

A new virus appears in the near future and frightens all continents. It is new, it is lethal and can be a mutation of H5N1, with transmission between humans. There is no vaccine and creates impediments in international travel and chaos at airports with body temperature control and use of masks for protection.

The region where it all begins is China, Korea, Japan, Philippines. It affects a major international sports event such as the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchan. There is no relation with the Japanese Virus influenza.

Read my Monkeypox foresight published by the Telegram group, on June, 2020

I asked today not to see any diseases. I want to see good things. I was here deep in emails and I saw those huge prickly pimples on some skin like it was smallpox.

The month’s Eclipse moves your social group and your past. Friends can be a big disappointment. Don’t get upset. Better to know who is really on your side. You might feel like you need to break away from some institution like a sports club or church. In short, the month brings a major cleanup in your social sector. Release all grudges. Finances are fine, but you feel like taking risks. Not just in investments, but also in your love life. You’re seeking excitement and adventure. That’s fine, but be careful not to do so around the time of Mercury’s retrograde.

Did you strengthen your social group last month as I advised? If so, good! This month’s Eclipse puts the focus back on to the Self. It’s the ideal time to change your look/image. Buy new clothes, cut your hair, do aesthetic procedures or whatever it takes to renew your appearance. Your finances were stable last month, but this month, they also deserve some newness. This could mean looking for a new job or finding a second source of income. Afraid? Don’t be! These will be welcome changes. This month promises good profits and novelty every day. There is no rest. Your health is still strong, but slow down on the day of the Eclipse. And be careful that love doesn’t get out of hand! You can fall in love with someone unusual. Singles and married people experience unprecedented affective situations. GOOD DAYS: 1, 3, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19, 25, 28, 29
